thread.title: Mallard Creek falls in AP N.C. prep football poll
thread.title_full: Mallard Creek falls in AP N.C. prep football poll

author:
Langston Wertz Jr. 
lwertz@charlotteobserver.com
title: Mallard Creek falls in AP N.C. prep football poll
text:
Mallard Creek falls in AP N.C. prep football poll 
Mavericks, upset 31-28 by Hough, fall from No. 1 to No. 7 
Hough enters N.C. 4A poll at No. 10 
Charlotte Catholic moves to No. 3 JASON E. MICZEK WWW.MICZEKPHOTO.COM Order Reprint of this Story 
After having a 43-game conference win streak snapped by Hough Friday night, Mallard Creek took a big tumble in the Associated Press N.C. 4A poll. 
A statewide panel of media members dropped the Mavericks from No. 1 to No. 6. Hough, which won 31-28 in overtime , entered the poll at No. 10. 
Several other area teams are ranked in the 4A poll. Charlotte Catholic, which moved to the top of the Observer’s Sweet 16 poll for the first time this week , is No. 3. A.L. Brown moved up a spot to No. 7. 
Wake Forest, which has lost to Mallard Creek in the past two N.C. 4AA state finals, is the new No. 1 team. 
Below is the poll: 
RALEIGH, N.C. (AP) _ The Associated Press state high school football poll for the week of October 13, first-place votes in parentheses, records and total points as voted upon by a statewide panel of prep sports writers: 
^Class 4-A= 
† 1. Wake Forest (10) (7-0) 138 2 
† 2. Scotland County (3) (8-0) 134 3 
† 3. Charlotte Catholic (1) (7-0) 112 4 
† 4. East Forsyth (7-0) 85 6 
† 5. Southern Pines Pinecrest (7-0) 83 5 
† 6. Kannapolis Brown (7-0) 62 7 
† 7. Charlotte Mallard Creek (1) (6-2) 53 1 
† 8. Apex Middle Creek (8-0) 46 8 
† 9. Greensboro Dudley (6-1) 34 9 
†10. Cornelius Hough (6-1) 18 NR 
¶
